SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID ,A.AGENT_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.GROUP_ID ,B.TITLE AS GROUP_TITLE ,REPLACE(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_ILSI, '%p %h:%i %m-%d-%Y'),'AM', '오전'),'PM','오후') AS UPDATED_CONVERSION_ILSI ,A.CREATED_ILSI FROM MEMO A LEFT JOIN MEMO_GROUP B ON A.GROUP_ID = B.ID ) AA WHERE AA.AGENT_ID = #{agentId}
ORDER BY ${sortItem} ${sortType}
